data.title: Compliance
data.description:
Painful to pinpoint the relevant data from a stack of logs
 Time intensive to fetch from archival/blob storage
 Easily retrieve any data requested by the auditors
 Maximum Storage Efficiency with 20x data compression
 Sub-second data retrieval
 Ensure complete data retention
 Identify missing information

data.description:

data.title: Analytics and Reporting
data.description:
Traditional database’s slow processing analytical queries

data.title: Observability
data.description:
